settings.title: Emma Original Mattress
settings.desc:
Unbeatable value

Affordable luxury, transformative sleep. Ingenious point-elastic design supports your body's every curve and spine with unmatched precision.

  • Pressure relief
  • Long lasting and durable
  • Our best-selling mattress

settings.caption_headline: The mattress that put Emma on the map
settings.caption_content: The Emma Original changed the game when it comes to improving sleep

settings.title: Materials
settings.content: Emma smoothly combines high-quality materials to create a dream-like mattress that conforms to every body type. Through the combination of our extensive research and advanced foam technology, Emma offers the comfiest sleep possible. Emma mattresses offer comfort point-elastic caving that enables an ideal and unique fit for your body. As a result, your spine stays straight while at the same time offering you the necessary amount of support and comfort.

settings.title: Certifications
settings.content: Our top-of-the-line foams are all CertiPUR-USÂ® certified, meaning, they are made without any ozone-depleting chemicals and safe from VOCs, formaldehyde, and phthalates.

Free no contact delivery for all orders

Dispatched in: 1 business day
Take your time to decide whether or not Emma is for you
Every Emma product is top-notch quality

settings.heading: Tossing and turning is a thing of the past
settings.content: With the Emma Original, youâre getting three layers of thick, pressure-relieving foam and over 100 supporting points so that your body is fully supported. Feel your spine relax with the elastic Airgocell foam while being embraced by the adaptive Visco foam, and wake up feeling renewed and refreshed.

settings.heading: We've got all your bases covered
settings.content: The Emma Original was made to last. Every inch of the mattress is made with highly durable materials and is topped with a breathable, moisture regulating cover for better airflow. It also protects the mattress structure from sagging. To top it all off, youâre getting a 10-year warranty & 365-night free trial with a money-back guarantee.

settings.heading: A good night's sleep is guaranteed
settings.content: Our best-selling and most-awarded mattress will guarantee nights that are comfortable, relaxing, and supportive for your body. From the price point to the effectivity to the quality of the materials, the Emma Original has everything youâll ever want in a mattress.

settings.title: The covers that are super easy to wash
settings.content: The Emma cover is soft-to-touch, making it very comfortable to lie on. It is also completely removable, making it extremely easy to wash.

settings.title: The foam that regulates temperature

settings.title: Sleeping will never be the same

settings.title: High quality mattress!
settings.content: I have used Emma Mattress for more than a month now and I'm totally in love with it. The quality of the mattress and comfort is definitely noteworthy. I would highly recommend using Emma if you are looking for premium quality mattress
settings.author: Javeria A.

settings.title: Excellent hybrid mattress
settings.content: Excellent mattress, not too firm and not too soft, either! I got the pillow too, which I got to adjust by taking out one layer. I'm a side sleeper so the flexibility here was a gamechanger for me
settings.author: Ben A.

settings.title: Best quality sleep I've ever had!
settings.content: I didn't realize how bad my previous mattress was until I received my Emma mattress. Not only do I sleep straight through the night (mind you, I sleep with my partner and dog and don't feel their movements at all!), I wake up energized and well rested. I no longer have any body aches and never feel too hot/too cold. Highly recommend!
settings.author: Jonathan W.

settings.title: Great for couples
settings.content: We've tried orthopedic mattresses in the past, but returned it because they're TOO firm. I prefer soft ones, while my husband prefers firm. For some strange reason, this mattress just works for the both of us. His back pain's gone and I've been sleeping like a log every night!
settings.author: Donna C.

settings.title: Uninterrupted sleep all night
settings.content: This was recommended to me by my friend since I've been waking up in the middle of the night with my old mattress. So glad I listened cuz now I've been sleeping straight and waking up without a sweat

settings.title: Best sleeping with Emma

settings.title: Free Returns
settings.content: If Emma isnât for you, our customer service team will take care of you

settings.title: Is it free to return your products?
settings.content:
It's 100% free to return your Emma! If your Emma turns out not to suit you for any reason, feel free to return it. Just simply get in contact with us via our chat support, phone or email and we will refund and collect it at no cost to you.


Live support is also available from 08:00 to 18:00 GMT-6, Monday-Friday!

settings.title: How does your 365-Night-Trial work?
settings.content:
Our risk-free 365-night trial means that you get a full year to decide if your Emma mattress is a good fit for you. This gives you more time to try the mattress for yourself and experience the benefits that our 4Million+ customers have come to enjoy each night!

Helpful Tip: We recommend you sleep on your Emma for at least 21 nights so that you and your body can get suited to your new Emma mattress.

You can begin your 365-night trial today. Our 0% APR financing with Affirm also gives you the option to make 12 equal payments over the next 12 months.

settings.title: Do you ship nationwide?
settings.content: We do offer free shipping in all the province in Canada.

settings.title: How long does shipping take?
settings.content: Our free shipping takes approximately 5-7 days nationwide.
